channel.title: Corrupted Vista Partition
channel.description:
I don't know if anybody can help me, but it's worth a try.
Vista fixes bad entries on my hard-drive during boot. This happens occasionally, a few days ago it fixed a lot of errors and then finished booting the system.
Basically, I can't view any file on drive (D) and you get the point.
Refrain from telling me: Format your drive, check if your hard-drive is plugged in.
I am not really skilled with hard-drives, MFTs and ect..

item.title: Corrupted Vista Partition
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
